title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: Bug 3970 - The Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse, as they are cheaper than Unix boxes. Currently, when creating a new file, the line delimiter used is the one returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always be what the user wants.
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter is not always what the user wants.
